text: Relevant standard or guidance document should be referenced when determining values for LOAEL and SOAEL for noise. The standard or guidance should only be used within its intended scope. Where appropriate, it is expected that the most-up-to-date version of British Standard 4142 ‘Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound’ will be used. For such cases, a ‘rating level’ of 10dB below background at 1 metre from the boundary of the nearest noise sensitive receiver should be considered as the design criterion.
